message: I can give an example if you want one.

Hey Thomas,

I'm wondering if there is a preferred method (and/or example) to determine if or if not to run some code depending if a particular value matches to a particular YAML key?

I've tried some things like find_each (and granted, I'm a Rails novice), but I cannot find something that seems to work.

Thanks,
Should be as simple as: data.filename.value == "somevalue"
Okay, this is quick and a little sloppy, but I think it gets the idea across: https://gist.github.com/1470557
hm... I couldn't get this to work, I'll get a gist ready
First, probably best to keep with Ruby conventions, using underscores instead of dashes or camelCasing.
